title: "Spectate Game"
body:
It seems like we aren't able to spectate friends  games anymore? I have a friend who plays a lot and I can't watch him (its greyed out) and same when I'm playing he can't see my games.

Is there a way to fix this or is it something that's been switched off?

replies.body: What game-mode were they playing? Spectate isn't available for all modes.
